add_library(stb_vorbis STATIC
    src/stb/stb_vorbis.c
)
target_include_directories(stb_vorbis PUBLIC "src")
add_library(stb_image_write STATIC
    src/stb/stb_image_write.c
)
target_include_directories(stb_image_write PUBLIC "src")

add_library(stb_image STATIC
    src/stb/stb_image.c
)
target_include_directories(stb_image PUBLIC "src")
